description:
After the One Year War, White Base navigator Mirai Yashima married the ship`s captain Bright Noa, and their family has since expanded to include their son Hathaway and daughter Cheimin. The Noa family live in a military residence at the Federation`s Jaburo base, effectively making them hostages to ensure Bright`s continued loyalty, but when Bright defects to the AEUG resistance group Mirai spirits their kids out of harm`s way and sets out to get them safely off the Earth.
Source: Official Site
name: Mirai Noa
